name: The World of Gangs
description:
◆Story

At the beginning of the world, men were no different from animals, and there were so such things as states or families. The unnamed sea of uncertainty was an obstacle to the growth of man's wisdom. Then suddenly, a strange stone fell into the centre of the sea. Therefore, that land was named ‘Xianluo’.

In the early days of Xianluo, there were war and turmoil everywhere. In the midst of this chaos, there was a person who was invincible with just her own abilities. Legend has it that she wielded a divine weapon that no one in the world could defeat. This woman was able to overpower all the others and unite Xianluo. She named her kingdom ‘Long Age’, called herself the ‘Emperor of Age’ and set up the calendar ‘The Ages’ to inform the world. After that, the world had come to peace.



The unnamed weapon was called the ‘Skyhill Sword’ because it was like the sky dome dominating all the hills.

But now, with the legend of Skyhill’s pair ‘Heaven Sword’ emerging, the world of gangs was about to be embroiled in a huge fight again.
This was the reason why the disciple of the King’s Mountain Gang, Lu Huangding, and the daughter of the gang’s master, Yuan Liai, embarked on their journey...

◆Gameplay Instructions

The game is an RPG with bitmap animated main storyline and a portrait dialogue system, and a map system to enter scenes for storylines or trigger events.

Explore the scenes for treasures and defeat enemies to gain powerful equipment, and learn new martial arts skills by completing the mastery side stories to become more resourceful in battle.



There are many exciting sex scenes. But you can choose to avoid them by not triggering them to achieve a pure love ending.

◆Game features

◇Lots of basic CG+different score
◇RPG storyline plus map exploration, battle system and other rich contents
◇Two main female characters, two secondary female characters
◇H plot mainly for NTR
